title: OpenNext Gets Closer to Making Next.js Truly Portable
author: Mary Branscombe
description: Frontend and backend choices can be more connected than developers expect; OpenNext aims to untangle the complexities of Vercel's Next.js.
cntitle: OpenNext 进一步实现 Next.js 的真正可移植性
cndescription: 前端和后端的选择可能比开发者预期的关联更紧密；OpenNext 旨在解开 Vercel 的 Next.js 的复杂性。
